column5: Hi Guy's,  My friend's father is over from the BVI and actually owns a fly fishing guideÂ company. He would like to do some fly fishing, in the Newmarket area.  I'm not a fly fisherman myself but where should I look at taking him?  Many thanks, Z
Is he particular about what species he is fishing for?
I don't think he really has a preference, but trout is always nice! I'm a bass guy myself
Not my area and not a fly fisherman myself, no idea what they flyfish for down in the BVI, but I have seen people fly fish for a lot of species.
Thanks guys. He fishes for bonefish and tarpon down there
This forum is so much nicer than Ontario Fishing Forums! I really appreciate the responses, someone reached out and helped me. You guy's a cool!
